metadata.name: Please Follow
metadata.description:
The definitions of words evolve over time as the world changes around them. In the online space, following is almost a transaction. But what if we took back the old meaning of just coming along with someone on their journey?Â 

This conceptual composite photograph and self-portrait is what I consider to be the beginning of my career as an artist in 2013. In creating "Please Follow", I deliberately chose to go into the unknown and follow my calling, and as an artist I ask the viewer to follow me into the wonderland of dreams.

Created with a Canon 5D MkII and Adobe Photoshop.
